üõ£Ô∏è Your Development Journey

Use arrow keys and space to choose what to analyze
LLMCL

LLMCL

Aider

üñ±Ô∏è LLMCL Interactive Workflow
üöÄ Start Analysis
llmcl . --interactive
üìÅ Navigate with Arrow Keys
‚Üë‚Üì to move, ‚Üí to expand folders, ‚Üê to collapse
‚úÖ Select with Space
Space to select files/folders, Tab to switch sections
‚öôÔ∏è Configure Options
Set output format, choose LLM provider, exclude patterns
üåê Auto-Launch Browser
LLMCL opens your LLM provider with analysis ready to paste
üìã Paste & Explore
Ctrl+V the analysis, start asking insightful questions!
‚ö° Essential Aider Commands
ü§ñ Start with Claude Sonnet
aider --model sonnet
üî• Use Open Source Mistral
aider --model ollama_chat/mistrallarge
üìÇ Add Specific Files
aider src/main.py tests/test_main.py
üìñ Include Documentation
aider --read README.md src/
